hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.bio: Passionate full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies. I love creating efficient, scalable solutions and bringing ideas to life through code.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm passionate about creating digital experiences that make a difference. With years of experience in full-stack development, I bring ideas to life through clean, efficient code and thoughtful design.
about.journeyText1: My journey in software development began with curiosity and has evolved into a passion for solving complex problems through technology. I specialize in building scalable web applications that prioritize user experience and performance.
about.journeyText2: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or mentoring aspiring developers. I believe in continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I've worked on recently. Each one represents a unique challenge and learning experience.
projects.pageSubtitle: Here are some of my favorite projects that showcase my skills and passion for creating exceptional digital experiences.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.subtitle: A comprehensive overview of my technical skills and proficiencies across different technologies and tools.

contact.subtitle: I'm always interested in hearing about new opportunities and interesting projects.

contact.workTogetherSubtitle: I'm always open to discussing new opportunities, interesting projects, and potential collaborations.

me.title: Who am I?
me.subtitle: Full-Stack Developer & Software Engineer
me.bio1: Hello! I'm Ersan Ceylan, a passionate full-stack developer with a deep love for creating innovative digital solutions. My journey in software development has been driven by curiosity, continuous learning, and a desire to solve real-world problems through technology.
me.bio2: With expertise spanning modern web technologies, I specialize in building scalable applications that prioritize user experience and performance. I enjoy working with React, Next.js, Node.js, and various other cutting-edge technologies to bring ideas to life.
me.bio3: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community. I believe in the power of collaboration and continuous improvement, always striving to write clean, maintainable code that makes a difference.
me.quote: "Code is not just about solving problems; it's about creating experiences that empower people and make their lives better."
